title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama project: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Code Llama, and other large language models locally on macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, retrieval, and tool use.

title: llama-index-integrations/llms/llama-index-llms-ollama
summary: LlamaIndex LLM and embedding drivers for local Ollama models; plug into RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama; markdown, code highlighting, multi-user, model manager.

title: ollama-webui-lite
summary: Lightweight SvelteKit UI for Ollama; same look as the full WebUI but minimal dependencies.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting, managing models, and viewing logs with fuzzy search.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) published to Docker Hub; one-liner local deployment.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama; Kotlin DSL, Spring Boot starters, and reactive wrappers.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; includes Rails generator and background-job helpers.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Async Rust crate with tokio support; ergonomic builder pattern for chat and embeddings.

title: ollama-go
summary: Go client library for Ollama; small surface area, context cancellation, and streaming JSON.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake that packages Ollama and a curated model set; reproducible local deployments.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: Cross-platform desktop app (Tauri + React) that unifies Ollama and GPT4All models in one UI.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client with Source Generator templates for strongly-typed chat protocols.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.
